snippet.title: Glyph - Announcement Trailer - On Steam August 9th!
snippet.description:
Glyph’s gameplay combines breathtaking aerial maneuvers with tranquil exploration in a stunning 3D platforming experience. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1569150/Glyph/

Add a mesmerizing original soundscape, and Glyph is lifting you up and whisking you away.

More details:
Website: https://playglyph.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayGlyph
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayGlyph
Discord: https://discord.gg/FCQj4C5
